title: gameplay  lux's ulti casting while silence
body: lux's ult will continue to cast even when silenced  giving her unfair advantage  vs champs with a silence and as their main cc fix plz   currently confirmed on sorakas silence. have not tested on others if anyone else has any test results feel free to post here also.

replies.body: is this one of those doesnt know cast time vs channel time?
Well it's a cast time and not a channel.
